data.text: @_angelo_ma Hi Angelo. Cooked food for personal consumption is allowed in your hand carry as long as it does not emit strong odors (i.e., dried fish, atchara, shrimp paste, etc.). Please ensure that it's properly packed and sealed to avoid any spills in the cabin.

@Knowbadi1 Hi Knowbadi. If you availed Ceb Prepaid Baggage. Any excess in piece, weight and size are subject to existing Extra Bag Fee, Excess Baggage Fee and/ or Oversized Baggage Fee, respectively. Visit https://t.co/lXA1Cho2q6 for more information.
@jelof21 Got this Jelo. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon.
@JeffersonTe4 Hi Jefferson, hope to see you on-board soon! To check on the affordable fares and schedules, please visit our site: https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam. Thanks!
@TornadoKween You're most welcome Kweeen!
@TornadoKween Congratulations Kweeen! :)
@bell_costa Yes Isabelle. We only allow drones with dry or lithium batteries in the hand carry. It's best to remove the batteries and store them properly in your checked baggage.
@bell_costa Hi Isabelle. We only allow drones with dry or lithium batteries in the hand carry. It's best to remove the batteries and store them properly in your checked baggage.

data.text: @joonszbonsai Hi Rock Bison⁷! Yes, hair curlers and straighteners may be packed in your hand carry. Please make sure to remove the battery (if any) before packing. Note that passengers can only bring up to one (1) curler or straightener that contain hydrocarbon gas. See you on board!
@everybodyhapp12 Hi everybodyhappy. Standard check in time for international flight is 3 hours before the flight. Stay safe.

@jelof21 I'm sorry to hear this Jelo. If you are having a hard time, you may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided. Stay safe.

@obraespanola You're welcome and have a good day!

data.text: @mitzchie05 Hi Mitzchie. Musical instruments are allowed in handcarry as long as it is smaller than 56cm x 36cm x 23cm and maximum weight of  (7)kilos. If bigger than this, it's best to pack it properly in a hardshell case for check-in. For more info, visit https://t.co/EhmSrp2L5V. Thanks!

@FerdsHezekiah Hi Ferds. Acoustic guitar may be hand-carried but must be in soft case, properly packed and as long as it is smaller than 56cm x 36cm x 23cm and has a maximum weight of seven (7) kilos.  For more info, visit https://t.co/EhmSrp2L5V. I hope this helps. Thanks!

data.text: @tony_samm Hi Tony! sorry to hear about this. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.

@obraespanola Hi Obra. Sha here. Checked baggage that exceeds 39 inches are subject to existing Extra Bag Fee, Excess Baggage Fee, and/or Oversized Baggage Fee, respectively. For more information, visit https://t.co/lXA1Cho2q6. Hope this helps.  Thank you and Have a great day ahead!

@nikkomusicart Hi Nikko! Requirements will depend on your destination. You can go to this link https://t.co/5glTT4YGnG for the requirements and validity of the documents. We also suggest coordinating with the embassy of your destination. Thank you!

@TrixieA79304922 Hi Trixie Ann.  Sha here.  To check the available schedules and  great value fares of Japan flight, please visit our website at https://t.co/bU2K2M97fc.  We hope to see you on board soon. Thanks!

data.text: @popartheart Hello popartheart! Sewing scissors is accepted for check-in. Please make sure that it is properly packed.

@TrixieA79304922 Hi Trixie. Excess baggage fee per kilo will depend on your point of origin. May we know your flight route ( from-to) ? Thanks.

@rainierrizal Hi there, rainierrizal! Yes, you can bring a portable clothes steamer in your hand carry, as long as it follows the dimensions for hand carry. For more information, visit https://t.co/rfiF2XaINK. Hope this helps!

data.text: @trinaskie Hi trinaskie! Authorization, valid ID and copy of your credit card is no longer needed when booking a ticket for other person. Just make sure the card is properly verified during booking and ticket is successful/confirmed. Thank you

@sexwithhyuk Thank you for raising the concern and our apologies also for the inconvenience, @sexwithhyuk. To check on this further, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

data.text: @yelxx_ Hi 藤田　マリエル. We will be glad to look into it. To further assist you and the security of your personal information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zvAz6wDXJv . Or, send us a private message via: https://t.co/gNaqWVnrV6. Thanks!

@i_jecrong Hi Jec. I'm sorry to hear about this. We recommend that prior accessing our website, please clear your cache, delete your cookies. Also, try a different browser and device.  If you're using the app, ensure that the app is updated or, uninstall then reinstall. Thanks!

@ChristineDiwata Regret if you feel that way, Christine. We will be glad to look into it. To further assist you andnsecurity of your information, please send us a  message  via Charlie the chatbot  thru: https://t.co/zo466tTAfA, send us a private message via: https://t.co/gNaqWVnrV6. Thanks!
@MarikuBorlado Got that, Mariku ! Don't worry, I'll let your case handler know that you reached out so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon. Thanks for your patience.

@andrewalub Hi Espuma. I'm sorry to hear about this experience. We recommend that prior accessing our website, please clear your cache and delete your cookies and try a different browser and device. If you're using the app,  ensure that the app is updated or, uninstall then reinstall.Thanks!
